title: IIT Bhubaneshwar Jobs 2025 - Apply Online for 101 Non-Teaching Staff Posts
description: The Indian Institute of Technology Bhubaneswar (IIT Bhubaneshwar) has officially released the notification to fill the 101 Medical Officer, Staff Nurse, Junior Engineer, Software Engineer, Junior Assistant, and Multi-Tasking Staff Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.E./M. Tech, Diploma, B.E./B. Tech in Mechanical, Electrical, Electronics, Civil Engineering, Any De...
